name: Baseball Games 2016 - Big Hit Home Run Superstar Derby ML
name_original: Baseball Games 2016 - Big Hit Home Run Superstar Derby ML
description:
GO BAT CRAZY WITH THE NUMBER ONE BASEBALL GAME ON APPLE TV!

Fast paced and realistic with amazingly easy controls - just bat away at the incoming balls and perfect your timing force and swing util you hit them out of the park!

- high-end, full HD 3d graphics with smooth animations and maximum framerate
- realistic physics with accurate trajectories and ball behavior
- four different gameplay modes included
- achievements, challenges and top lists coming soon!

Up-front one-time purchase only - includes complete game with all features and gameplay modes, no in-app purchases or other tricks!
